attributes.action: Reduce the age of general legal responsibility to 15 years old
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the momenet people under the age of 16 can avoid legal responsibility until there 16th birthday, i propose that this is reduced making an added percentage of young people responsible for their actions and therefore aware that antisocial behavior could result in a custodial sentance in a young offerders institute.
